introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What ZhaiYao delivers
introduce.label: Overview
introduce.description: ZhaiYao is an end-to-end AI meeting intelligence platform that converts audio into transcripts, summaries and workflow-ready tasks for any team meeting.

items.title: Accurate transcription
items.description: Multi-language, speaker diarization and noise-resistant transcripts powered by custom ASR + Whisper.

items.title: AI insights
items.description: Auto summaries, decisions, risks and TODOs synced to your workspace.

items.title: Collaborative workspace
items.description: Desktop, mobile and web experiences keep every stakeholder aligned instantly.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why teams switch to ZhaiYao
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Perfect for revenue teams, project reviews and remote leadership meetings that need reliable follow-ups.

items.title: Minutes to insights
items.description: Upload files or connect Zoom and let ZhaiYao transcribe, segment and summarize automatically.

items.title: Action items that ship themselves
items.description: Owners and due dates are detected automatically and pushed to Slack, Lark or email.

items.title: Enterprise-grade privacy
items.description: Encryption, isolated storage and granular permissions keep sensitive conversations safe.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: Three simple steps
usage.description: From board meetings to customer calls, every workflow follows the same playbook:

items.title: Record or import
items.description: Upload mp3/mp4, capture live audio or connect Zoom, Teams, Tencent Meeting, etc.

items.title: Auto transcribe & edit
items.description: AI diarizes speakers, generates editable transcripts and supports multi-user proofreading.

items.title: Generate summaries
items.description: One click to produce highlights, risks and next steps, shareable with any workspace.

items.title: Dispatch action items
items.description: Sync tasks to Jira, Lark, Slack or email so every owner knows what‚Äôs next.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Product capabilities
feature.description: A full pipeline covering audio transcription, AI reasoning and task automation.

items.title: Transcript engine
items.description: Custom acoustic model + Whisper powering 30+ languages and accents.

items.title: Speaker intelligence
items.description: Identify speakers, keywords and sentiment to make dialogs searchable.

items.title: Summary templates
items.description: Sales recap, weekly standup, investor update and more tailored prompt packs.

items.title: Action routing
items.description: Auto assign owners and deadlines, push to your task stack instantly.

items.title: Knowledge sync
items.description: Publish structured notes to Confluence, Notion or Feishu Docs in one click.

items.title: Security & audit
items.description: Granular access control, download watermarking and audit logs for compliance.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.description: Ping us via email or community if you need anything else.

items.title: What sources can I upload?
items.description: mp3, wav, m4a, mp4, mov and direct links from Zoom, Google Meet, Tencent Meeting, Lark Meeting and more.

items.title: How accurate is transcription?
items.description: Mandarin accuracy reaches 96%+ in typical environments, English and mixed conversations average 92%+ and improve with custom dictionaries.

items.title: Can I edit summaries?
items.description: Yes. Both transcripts and summaries are collaborative and versioned automatically.

items.title: How do you secure data?
items.description: Encrypted at rest and in transit, private deployment options plus audit logs and role-based permissions.

items.title: Which integrations are available?
items.description: Slack, Lark, DingTalk, Notion, Confluence, Jira and email today ‚Äì more via API.

items.title: Do you have an enterprise plan?
items.description: Yes, including private cloud deployment and custom models. Contact sales for details.

brand.title: ZhaiYao
